trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SEQ_00<tab>Seigetsu the Enlightened means to return the Dotharl's kindness.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the Namazu culinarian.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested supplies to the Namazu culinarian.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SEQ_03<tab>Report to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Namazu culinarian.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_TODO_02<tab>Report to Seigetsu the Enlightened.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_000<tab>The Dotharl have been so very generous in educating us in the ways of archery, I thought it only natural that we repay them somehow. Thus, did I seek out our most skilled chef to prepare an assortment of delicious delights in their honor.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_001<tab>Yes, there is no denying his culinary prowess, so long as he has an assistant to keep him on course, at least. On his own, well...if he were <var 09 E948 ((a Hyur)) ((an Elezen)) ((a Lalafell)) ((a Miqo'te)) ((a Roegadyn)) ((an Au Ra)) ((a Hrothgar)) ((a Viera)) /var> like you I would say he's all thumbs.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_002<tab>He's presently at Nhaama's Retreat gathering ingredients. It would put my mind at ease to know you were there to help him.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_010<tab>Sent by Seigetsu, you say? Oh, thank the heavens. I've made a complete hash of things, and not the delicious sort. No, no.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_011<tab>I somehow managed to ruin my favorite cooking knife. The blade is broken─split cleanly in two. Could you fashion another? Please, please? This crate here should have what you need.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_012<tab>I somehow managed to ruin my favorite cooking knife. The handle simply snapped off while I was mincing some herbs. Could you fashion another? Please, please? This crate here should have what you need.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_013<tab>I somehow managed to ruin my favorite cooking knife. The handle's fallen off, and I need something to stick it back together. I don't suppose you could create an adhesive? Please, please? This crate should have what you need to see the job done.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_014<tab>My cooking knife has grown rather dull, fairly blunt, and I cannot find my whetstone. I would be ever so grateful if you could procure another. The mineral deposits south of Reunion are like to have something I can use.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_015<tab>In my haste to gather ingredients, I've misplaced one of my steppe fruit. Would you procure another for me? Please, please? You'll find them growing in abundance south of Reunion.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_016<tab>In my haste to gather ingredients, I've misplaced my trout. Would you fish up another for me? Please, please. With a bit of salmon roe you'll have them biting in no time at the pond in Dotharl Khaa.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_017<tab>If there's anything else you need─anything at all─don't hesitate to ask. I'll be here gathering more herbs for our tribute to the Dotharl.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_018<tab>This crate here is teeming with supplies. You're certain to find what you need inside.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_019<tab>This crate here is teeming with supplies. You're certain to find what you need inside.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_020<tab>This crate here is teeming with supplies. You're certain to find what you need inside.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_028<tab>I'm sure any whetstone you find south of Reunion will be fine. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_029<tab>I'm sure any steppe fruit south of Reunion will serve nicely. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_030<tab>I'm sure any trout you fish up at Dotharl Khaa will serve nicely. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_040<tab>I imagine I'll have gathered enough herbs here by the time you finish. Do try not to take too long, though.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_041<tab>Oh, yes, yes! This is perfect. Exactly what I needed. At last I can finish my work.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_042<tab>I've created several original dishes specifically for this occasion. Hopefully they prove to the Dotharl's liking.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_043<tab>The Dotharl were quite taken with my cooking last time, delighted by its myriad flavors. I'm sure they'll love my next culinary creation!
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_044<tab>Tell Seigetsu to expect a dish worthy of the Big One himself. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_DAILYNAMAZUO03126_000_045<tab>Thank you again for your help, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Tell Seigetsu I won't be much longer.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_KOFUINSEIGETSU_100_050<tab>Welcome back, friend. How fares our chef?
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_050<tab>Did he now? Thankfully my surpassing foresight was able to lead you to him in his hour of need.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_051<tab>The Dotharl are like to experience a meal unlike any other. Assuming, of course, the chef doesn't literally throw himself into his work.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_052<tab><sigh> To think I ever wondered why my kin have had such trouble mastering the bow.

TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_053<tab>At our present pace, I daresay we'll be keeping the Dotharls' bellies full for quite some time. Should our chef be beset by troubles again, I hope we can count on your help.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
TEXT_BANNAM604_03126_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>Normal-quality items gathered in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
